## MixinConstructor type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type MixinConstructor<T extends AnyFunction> = T extends AnyFunction<infer M> ? (M extends AnyConstructor<Base> ? M & BaseConstructor : M) : ReturnType<T>;
```
